msg
Hmm... What Emesa said actually makes sense. If we can scavenge the junks from the battlefield, perhaps it will ease our resource shortage.

うん……エミザの話は理に適っていると思う。もし戦場の資源を再利用できれば、基地の負担を減らせるかもしれない。
응……에미자의 말은 일리가 있는 것 같아. 만약 전장의 자원을 재활용할 수 있다면, 기지의 부담을 줄일 수 있을지도 몰라.
Hmm... What Emesa said makes sense. If we can recycle resources from the battlefield, it might reduce the burden on the base.
Well ...... Emesa guy said something seems to make sense, if you can reuse the resources on the battlefield then maybe you can reduce the burden on the base.
Yeah ...... I think Emesa's story makes sense. If we could recycle resources from the battlefield, it might reduce the burden on our bases.
msg
Ah... Your timing is perfect. I've been thinking a lot after Emesa's request. Instead of Homi parts, we could actually collect everything that might prove to be useful to us.
啊~你来的正好，之前埃米沙的委托之后我想了很多，不仅是吼姆机器人的零件，只要是对基地有帮助的东西似乎都可以再利用一下呢~
あ、ちょうどいいところに！この前のエミザの依頼のあと色々考えたんだけれど、ホミロボットの部品だけでなく基地に役立つ物なら全て再利用しようと思って！
아, 마침 잘 왔어! 이전에 에미자의 의뢰 후에 이것저것 생각해봤는데, 호미로봇 부품뿐만 아니라 기지에 도움이 되는 거라면 모두 재활용하려고!

Oh, perfect timing! I've been doing a lot of thinking after Emesa's last commission, and I've decided that we should recycle everything that could be useful for the base, not just the parts of those Homei mechas!
Ah ~ you came just in time, after the commission of the previous Emesa I thought a lot, not only the parts of the Howlom robot, as long as the base can help things can be reused it seems ~
Oh, just in time! I've been doing a lot of thinking after the last request from Emesa, and I've decided to reuse everything that is useful to the base, not just the parts of the hominid robots!
msg
I knew you would agree. Let's go look around the base and see if we can find anything that has values.
